bug.short_desc: Do not build for arm because of broken deps
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: Description of problem: Please do not build this package for ARM to avoid this broken dependency: [golang-github-mistifyio-go-zfs] golang-github-mistifyio-go-zfs-devel-0-0.1.git1b4ae6f.fc24.noarch requires zfs-fuse
I am aware of that. As the rpm is noarch, random architectures is picked. Not sure if the ExcludeArch can do something about it.

The packages is a building dependency of cadvisor. zfs is one of the filesystems it supports. There are other fs such as btrfs, aufs, overlay. The code can be patch on arm so the zfs is disabled by default.
golang-github-mistifyio-go-zfs-0-0.2.git1b4ae6f.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-302bf8a1b3

Proposed as a Freeze Exception for 24-final by Fedora user till using the blocker tracking app because:
The update for this package fixes a broken dependency in the base repo, see https://fedorahosted.org/rel-eng/ticket/6416 for more details.

Discussed at 2016-06-13 blocker review meeting: [1].
This bug was accepted as Final Freeze Exception: this change fixes dependency issues in the base repo and doesn't look to have any possible impact on release quality
[1] https://meetbot.fedoraproject.org/fedora-blocker-review/2016-06-13/f24-blocker-review.2016-06-13-16.04.html
update installs on x86_64 and definitely doesn't have an ARM build of the offending package.
golang-github-mistifyio-go-zfs-0-0.2.git1b4ae6f.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
